lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh's Jameson Taillon remembers Hernan Perez from their days opposing each other in the minors. The rookie right-hander would just as soon forget about him now.

headline.print_headline: Perez's 3 RBIs Lead Brewers Over Pirates 5-3
headline.main: Perez's 3 RBIs Lead Brewers Over Pirates 5-3
